name: acbr-comic-book-reader
description: Comic book reader and converter for CBZ, CBR, CB7, EPUB and PDF files
author: Álvaro García (www.binarynonsense.com)

scripts.dist:linux: npm run 7zbin:linux && npm run build:linux && npm run extras:linux
scripts.dist:windows: npm run build:windows && npm run extras:windows
scripts.dist:cross: npm run dist:cross-windows && npm run dist:cross-linux
scripts.dist:cross-linux: npm run sharp:linux && npm run dist:linux
scripts.dist:cross-windows: npm run sharp:windows && npm run dist:windows
scripts.extras:linux:
echo '#!/bin/bash
export G_SLICE=always-malloc && ./acbr-comic-book-reader "$@"' > ./dist/linux-unpacked/ACBR.sh && shx chmod +x ./dist/linux-unpacked/ACBR.sh && echo '#!/bin/bash
export G_SLICE=always-malloc && ./acbr-comic-book-reader.AppImage "$@"' > ./dist/ACBR.sh && shx chmod +x ./dist/ACBR.sh && echo '#!/bin/bash
export G_SLICE=always-malloc && acbr-comic-book-reader "$@"' > ./dist/ACBR_deb.sh && shx chmod +x ./dist/ACBR_deb.sh && echo ${npm_package_version} > ./dist/linux-unpacked/VERSION && echo ${npm_package_version} > ./dist/VERSION
scripts.licenses: license-checker > licenses/node_modules.txt && shx sed -i 's/path.*node_modules/path: node_modules/' ./licenses/node_modules.txt && shx sed -i 's/licenseFile.*node_modules/licenseFile: node_modules/' ./licenses/node_modules.txt && npm run localization licenses
